page.title: 14School Trip,Bradford
page.content: I thought the trip was great.I liked it in the adventure playground.I liked the tower best.I went up the tall tower.I was a bit scared,because it was so high.I played with Ben and the two big boys,Roger and Greg.They chased us and when they caught us they put us in prison behind the fence.I found out how to get out.I put my foot on a stick and jumped out.Then when Roger and Greg caught me again they stretched me.Every time we went over the bridge Roger and Greg captured us,but sometimes I hid under the log cabin.Then they looked everywhere for me.Then I popped out and shouted to them.Greg came and chased me and I fell,but I did not cry.
